criteria: Ability to identify and list appropriate individuals to seek help from when feeling unsafe or threatened.
Understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals in providing support and safety.
descriptions: Student is unable to identify any individuals to seek help from or lists inappropriate individuals.
Student lists one appropriate individual or lists multiple individuals with limited explanation of their roles.
Student lists two appropriate individuals and briefly explains their roles in providing help.
Student lists three appropriate individuals and provides a clear explanation of their roles and how they can assist.
Student lists four appropriate individuals and provides a detailed explanation of their roles, including specific ways they can offer support.

Student lists five or more appropriate individuals, provides a comprehensive explanation of their roles, and demonstrates a thorough understanding of how to access their support in various situations.
Student demonstrates no understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals.
Student demonstrates a limited understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals.
Student demonstrates some understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals but lacks detail.
Student demonstrates a clear understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals.
Student demonstrates a detailed understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals, including their limitations.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the roles and responsibilities of the listed individuals, including their limitations and how to navigate different support systems.
